div.p:
The Clara White Mission and its many branches help mankind daily
giving food, shelter and clothing to those unfortunate souls who
for one reason or another are unable to furnish for themselves
the bare necessities.

The Old Folks Home furnishes a home for the elderly, where they
may enjoy the comforts of life during the "evening of their life"."evening of their life."

We have started a home for underprivileged and orphaned children.
This home will be in units supervised by a house mother, making
it more of a home than an institution. It will house children
needing this type of service.

The Historic Museum is of educational value. We need at least a
part-time worker for this branch.

Another of our most recent branches, the USO, located at
741 West Ashley Street, is furnishing wholesome recreation for
young men of the Armed Services. This type of recreation was
not a part of our local community. Seeing the need for such
a place, we went forwad to fill the need. The facilities in
this building include public showers where individuals can take
a bath. We here need your help as we do not receive funds from
any source except what Miss Eartha M. M. White has contributed.

We have organized a boys' club to try curb some of the
deliquency among youth in this area. We need your help here.

In fact, the agency and its many branches are in dire need of
financial assistance to help carry on this great work.

The Clara White Mission does not get any help for the Mission.
The appropriation from the City is for the Nursery and Old Folks
Home. This appropriation is deposited to the account of the
designated agency and spent through that account. The appropriation for these two agencies has been cut and this is causing an extreme
hardship on the agencies.

Enclosed you will find a post card, showing pictures of some of our
branches. Any appropriation you many give will be sincerely
appreciated and at the same time help us to help humanity.
